name: random location
content:
Generates a random x and y position. 

This block can be used anywhere a location block is needed.

examples.name: Example 1
examples.description: The bunny will appear at a random location each time the project is run.

examples.name: Example 2
examples.description: Every time the ghost is clicked, it will jump to a random location.

short_description: Generates a random x and y position.
tips: - Sprites can begin at a random location or move to a random location after an event.
